answers.answer: Do you feel like you have a fever? Its always best to get checked if you are worried.  At least it will put your mind at ease.
I actually feel normal. Just lightheaded, I would drive myself to the doctors.. but I dont even trust myself to do that. I'd have to wait for my bf to get home which is another hour and a half
Have you drank enough water today. Drink lots of water and lay on your left side see how you ferl when he gets home. How is your blood pressure?
You should have your blood pressure checked. That sounds a lot like how I felt at 35 weeks it turned out I had preeclampsia. Find someone to take you in to be safe.
It sounds like u need iron. I feel light headed because I am anemic so I take an iron supplement
Are you feeling any better today? Did you get checked?

Im not too much better, I feel about the same. Can't really eat too much without feeling nauseous. I just don't like going to the doctors and them thinking im making such a big deal over nothing, besides tomorrow is my baby shower as well :/ so I definitely dont want to feel horrible tomorrow!

question: Im 33 weeks and I've been feeling really light headed today and feel like throwing up. Im usually fine.. but I woke up like this. I know its not a cold or the flu. Does anyone have an idea? I hate calling the hospital because they dont give advice over the phone, I'd have to go in.
title: need help
